# rsic2

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of rsic2 is to provide a R interface to build, compute, and exploit
results of simulations handled by [the SICÂ² software](https://sic.g-eau.fr).

## Installation

You can install the development version of rsic2 from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("inrae/rsic2")
```

## Usage

Load the library:

```{r example}
library(rsic2)
```

Display the documentation:

```{r}
#| eval: false
help(package = "rsic2")
```
